title: DAX Fridays! #182: Virtual relationships with CONTAINS DAX function
excerpt: Contains is more powerful that it looks and in this video I will show you how you can use it to create virtual relationships and joins.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
